sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Creates payload objects for service goods receipt action.

Inputs :

  • Service GR Record - References the receipt record.
  • Iteration Count - Count to pass quantity based on erp number
  • ERP Number - ERP number

Outputs :

  • Service GR Record - Objects containing below fields:

    • Entry Sheet Number
    • External entry sheet number
    • Person Responsible (Internally)
    • Person Responsible (Externally)
    • Location Where Service Was Performed
    • Price Reference Date of Entry Sheet
    • Period
    • End of period
    • Package number
    • Short Text of Service Entry Sheet
    • Purchasing Document Number
    • Item Number of Purchasing Document
    • Block Release of Entry Sheet
    • Points score for on-time delivery
    • Points score for quality of services
    • Document Date in Document
    • Posting Date in the Document
    • Reference Document Number
    • Account Assignment Category
    • Technical Reference Field for External Entry Sheet Number
    • User field: Service entry sheet
    • Acceptance indicator
    • Indicator: Final Entry Sheet
    • Reference Document Number (for Dependencies see Long Text)
    • External Entry Sheet Number (Dependencies: See Long Text)

  • Service GR Services - Array of objects containing below fields:

    • Cost Center - Objects containing these fields:
      • Name
      • Controlling Area
      • Cost Center
      • Valid To Date
      • Currency Key
  • Total Rows - Return the total number of records present in SAP Payload.
  • Action Status - Object containing following fields:
    • Code - If the request is executed successfully, code will be set to 0 but if the request failed, code will be set to 1.
    • Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Creates payload objects for service goods receipt action.

Inputs :

  • Service GR Record - References the receipt record.
  • Iteration Count - Count to pass quantity based on erp number
  • ERP Number - ERP number

Outputs :

  • Service GR Record - Objects containing below fields:

    • Entry Sheet Number
    • External entry sheet number
    • Person Responsible (Internally)
    • Person Responsible (Externally)
    • Location Where Service Was Performed
    • Price Reference Date of Entry Sheet
    • Period
    • End of period
    • Package number
    • Short Text of Service Entry Sheet
    • Purchasing Document Number
    • Item Number of Purchasing Document
    • Block Release of Entry Sheet
    • Points score for on-time delivery
    • Points score for quality of services
    • Document Date in Document
    • Posting Date in the Document
    • Reference Document Number
    • Account Assignment Category
    • Technical Reference Field for External Entry Sheet Number
    • User field: Service entry sheet
    • Acceptance indicator
    • Indicator: Final Entry Sheet
    • Reference Document Number (for Dependencies see Long Text)
    • External Entry Sheet Number (Dependencies: See Long Text)

  • Service GR Services - Array of objects containing below fields:

    • Cost Center - Objects containing these fields:
      • Name
      • Controlling Area
      • Cost Center
      • Valid To Date
      • Currency Key
  • Total Rows - Return the total number of records present in SAP Payload.
  • Action Status - Object containing following fields:
    • Code - If the request is executed successfully, code will be set to 0 but if the request failed, code will be set to 1.
    • Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
